name: Everything's Gone Grey
description:
You and your dogs are trapped in a whiteout in an inhospitable wasteland.

---

A short thing made for the Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend 1 Jam.

This turned into something quite different than originally planned. First time releasing anything 3D, would mostly just consider it a mood/atmosphere experiment.

May contain sudden noises.

Control with WASD + E while on foot

Sled controls:

SteerA/DBrakeS
Lift/Drop AnchorSpaceDismountE (sled must be anchored)

Press escape then L to quit
